definition: to eat in (at a restaurant) (Tw)/to take the medicine orally
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Taiyuan Railway Bureau has many Beijing locomotives, but most of them are only used in the station.
sentences.chinese: 太局還有不少小北京，不過基本上都是站內用了。

sentences.english: The duration of warm ischaemia is monitored using a stopwatch.
sentences.chinese: 在熱缺血期間內用秒錶進行監測。

sentences.english: The process using barium residue in three - phrase fluidized bed reactor was developed to remove sulfur dioxide from flue gas.
sentences.chinese: 提出了在三相流化牀內用鋇渣進行煙氣脫硫的方法。

sentences.english: Please imprint your card face number in this box by pencil.
sentences.chinese: 請於方格內用鉛筆印壓您信用卡卡面的號碼。

sentences.english: The product should be used up within 2 hours.
sentences.chinese: 砂漿啓蓋後應在2小時內用完。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenolic resin was synthesized by one - step synthesis in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室內用一步法合成了松香改性壬基酚醛樹脂。

sentences.english: You can de-bone a piece of chicken in your mouth within seconds.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在幾秒內用嘴去掉一塊雞肉的骨頭。

sentences.english: You can shell shrimp in your mouth within seconds.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在幾秒內用嘴剝蝦殼。

sentences.english: The microorganism substitutes arsenic for phosphorus in its cell components.
sentences.chinese: 這種細菌在其細胞內用磷代替砷。

definition: to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
take-out (fast food)/(outer part of) tire/as well/besides/into the bargain/outer zone
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
to place an order/to book ahead
to order à la carte/single point (of measurement, mounting etc)
